description:
Sanada Yukimura`s 10 Crucifix Insects attack one village after another. The Insect Magistrate rushes to Edo Castle, where she discovers a secret in Nagatomimaru`s room.  And the secret past of Jinbei`s father Genjuro, and how he met Jinbei`s mother, is revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iza Kishuu e! Sanada Jikketsuchuu, Arawaru!
To Kishuu! The Ten Crucifix Insects of Sanada Appear!
いざ紀州へ! 真田十傑蟲, 現る!
